deIdi2b2.TEXT:
Record date: 2092-11-19
Reason for Visit
Nancy is a 74 y/o womanhere for evaluationof TH and DM treatment. Also, c/o pain in right knnee with weight bearing. Hashad for about 11 months. Naproxen helped in past. No swell red or hot. With AM stiffness. NO other joint complaints.
Problems

Diabetes mellitus type 2
Hypertension
Osteoarthritis
Polyarteritis : 20 years ago.

LISINOPRIL 10MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
GLYBURIDE 5 MG (5MG TABLET take 1) PO BID
Prevacid (LANSOPRAZOLE) 30 MG (30MG CAPSULE DR take 1) PO QD
Alphagan (BRIMONIDINE Tartrate) 1 DROP OU BID
METFORMIN 850 MG (850MG TABLET take 1) PO TID
PHENOBARBITAL 32.5 MG PO QD
ATENOLOL 25MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Allergies

Narrative History
Takes meds. No SEs. Nocturia x 2 ; polys-uria ;
Eyes- no complaints. Last exam - 10/92. Feet- no pain, numbness, burning.
Cor- No chest pain. No SOB. No palpitations. No lighthead. No PND. No orthopnea. No claudicatioin. No edema. No nausea
GI- No nausea. No vomitting. No dyspepsia. No reflux. No abdo pain. No diarrhea but has loose stool. No constipation. No melena. No BRBPR.
Neuro- No headache. No vision change. NO hearing change. No numbness. Hands, feet with tingling. No loss of strength. No seizures. No loss of balance.
ETOH/drugs- no
Cigs- no

Home glu-100's

Other complaints-no

PULSE 88

Exam
NAD,WD,WN
Eyes- conj & sclera not injected; EOMI,PERLA
M&T- lips and gums unremarkable. Good dentition. Moist; no erythema; no exudate; no lesions
Neck- supple. No JVD. No bruit. No LAN. No thyromegaly
Cor- reg rhyhm. S1S2 normal. No gallop. No rub. NO murmer.
Pulm- NO accessory muscle use. Percussion- normal. Palpation-normal. Auscultation-clear.
Abdo- normal BS;soft with no HSM. No mass. No tenderness
Ext/ feet: no edema; pulses intact and symmetric. Skin intact. Monofilament intact but less right foot.
Right knee- FROM with minimal crepitus. RIght thich <leeft.

Good BP. DM. OA but had CVA affecting right side so right side is weak.
Disposition and Plans
PT_ strengthening RLE. BMP,HgB AIC. Try Celebrex 100mg BID. RTC 4 month orPRN.
